data.name: Wordies
data.detailed_description:
WORDIES

The premise of wordies is simple, you're randomly assigned the task of guessing a commonly used American word. But with only 5 tries, Wordies is harder than it
looks. Wordies also features a Daily Word & a global highstreak leaderboard where you can compete with not only your friends but the rest of the world to be the best!

When guessing you're given 3 different clues in the form of colors to help you along your way!

Dark Gray

- Indicates the letter you've chosen does not appear in the word.

Orange

- Indicates the letter you've entered is in the word, but appears in a different place.

Green

- Indicates the letter is in the correct place, but there is still the possibility of it appearing twice!


Build up winstreaks, fustrate yourself, & challenge friends all in an hour of wordies!

data.short_description: Wordies is bringing a word game you've most likely played & enjoyed to Steam. But it's harder than before, with only 5 guesses you're given the not so easy task of guessing a common American word! Guess the daily word & build up highstreaks to compete against the world in our global leaderboards!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
